productVision: Modern e-commerce platform with product catalog, shopping cart, secure payment processing, order management, and customer reviews. Goal is to launch MVP in 3 months with core shopping features.

backlogItems.title: User Registration and Login
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want to create an account and login, so that I can save my preferences and view order history
acceptanceCriteria: User can register with email and password
Password meets security requirements (8+ chars, mixed case, numbers)

backlogItems.title: Product Catalog Browsing
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want to browse products by category, so that I can find items I'm interested in
acceptanceCriteria: Show product image, name, price, rating
Filter by category and price range

backlogItems.title: Shopping Cart Management
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want to add products to cart and modify quantities, so that I can purchase multiple items in one order
acceptanceCriteria: Add product to cart from product page
View cart contents with images and prices
Update quantities for items in cart

backlogItems.title: Checkout and Payment
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want to securely complete my purchase with credit card payment, so that I can receive my ordered products

backlogItems.title: Order History and Tracking
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want to view my past orders and track current shipments, so that I know when to expect delivery
acceptanceCriteria: View list of all past orders

backlogItems.title: Product Reviews and Ratings
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want to read reviews from other customers, so that I can make informed purchase decisions
acceptanceCriteria: Display average rating on product page
Show individual reviews with text and rating
Sort reviews by date or helpfulness
Customers can leave reviews after purchase

backlogItems.title: Wishlist Functionality
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want to save products to a wishlist, so that I can purchase them later

backlogItems.title: Admin Product Management
backlogItems.userStory: As an admin, I want to manage product catalog, so that I can add, update, and remove products
acceptanceCriteria: Admin login separate from customer login
Add new products with details and images

backlogItems.title: Performance Optimization
backlogItems.userStory: As a customer, I want pages to load quickly, so that I have a smooth shopping experience
acceptanceCriteria: Product pages load in under 2 seconds

backlogItems.title: Mobile Responsive Design
backlogItems.userStory: As a mobile customer, I want the site to work well on my phone, so that I can shop on the go
acceptanceCriteria: Responsive layout for mobile, tablet, desktop
Tested on iOS and Android devices
